summary.span: 代表已排序的 子項目集合。

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別會使用來代表它的子項目集合。The base class uses a to represent its collection of child elements. 方法和屬性所定義會影響所有的物件衍生自並定義通用的管理功能集子項目。Methods and properties defined by the affect all objects derived from and define a common feature-set for the manipulation of child elements. A具有其本身的內容 （類別） 的相似性。A has affinity to its own context (class). 您必須從擁有的內容來存取集合。You must access the collection from the context of the owning . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將子內容加入至父代。The following example uses the method to add child content to a parent . 您可以使用屬性，這是型別的。You do this by using the property, which is of type .
